title: Ticket #2388: SOFT_UID_DOMAIN must be true for dedicated slot users to work in the s
description: In order for per-slot users to work in the startd, SOFT_UID_DOMAIN must be set to true. These two features seem like they should be orthogonal -- should we check for SLOTx_EXECUTE before SOFT_UID_DOMAIN?
creator: gthain
